attributes.action: Allow xl bullys to continue living in social housing under the ban conditions.
attributes.additional_details: There are many xl bullys living in social housing with responsible owners. Many of these owners will now face eviction due to the preposed ban of the xl bully bread if they abide by the legislation and register their family pet in a bid to keep them. In order to abid by the new law and keep their family pet safely and lawfully these people need the security of their current property and not face eviction. A new legislation is needed in order to protect human rights and cut out discrimination.
attributes.background: Change the way the councils and other social housing are dealing with the preposed ban. Many dog owners are facing eviction if they register their dog under the ban. Pass a legislation to enable responsible owners to keep their xl bullys in social housing aslong as they abide by the ban conditions

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/651520
